thread.title: Chrissy Teigen And John Legend Share Baby News
thread.title_full: Chrissy Teigen And John Legend Share Baby News

author: news.sky
title: Chrissy Teigen And John Legend Share Baby News
text:
Chrissy Teigen and John Legend have announced they are expecting their first child - just a month after the model told of their struggle to conceive. The 29-year-old model and 36-year-old musician shared their news on Instagram with a black and white photo with the caption: "We're pregnant!"
Teigen wrote that conceiving a child hasn't been easy for the pair and that they are looking forward to expanding their family.
"John and I are so happy to announce that we are pregnant :) As many of you know, we've been trying to have a baby for a while now.
Teigen and Legend have been married for two years
"It hasn't been easy, but we kept trying because we can't wait to bring our first child into the world and grow our family. We're so excited that it's finally happening.
"Thank you for all your love and well wishes. I look forward to all the belly touching! Xx"
In September Teigen revealed that she and her husband of two years had sought advice from fertility doctors after trying for a baby for a number of years.
She also hit out at intrusive questions from some people about when she and Legend would start a family.
'It's kind of crazy because I can't imagine being that nosy to be like, ''So, when are the kids coming?'' because who knows what somebody's going through,' she said.
